features: Construction: Durable and breathable shell with minimal seams. Innovative down baffle interior construction with hidden waist adjustment to maximize insulation benefits
Zipper: YKK two-way oversized zipper, protected by a windproof flap with hidden snaps
Hood: Fixed with internal headband adjustment
Cuffs: Storm cuffs insulated for a secure and comfortable fit

Pockets: A YKK AQUASEAL® zippered pocket for wind and water resistance. Two utility pockets with snaps and two zippered hand pockets lined in microthermal polyester. Interior zippered pocket for easy access and the safe storage of essential items
Signature Quartz Co. patch: Black Alcantara Suede
